backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, app content, contact info, products, orders, and admin data with access-control‑protected CRUD methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and related tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, OG/Twitter SEO data, fonts, and root mount for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component toggling between home and admin views and managing order dialog state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBoots: Deprecated admin setup screen showing bootstrap status and messages despite no longer being required.
Wrapper component that now simply renders children because admin access is public.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Deprecated login UI retaining logic for admin auth and recovery, but marked as unnecessary due to public access.
frontend/src/components/admin/BasicTextA: Admin form for editing SEO metadata and basic business info, loading existing content and saving updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactAdm: Admin editor for contact section fields with validation for required inputs and URL formats, supporting updates to backend data.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersAdmi: Admin interface to view, filter, download files from, and delete customer orders with dialogs and status handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingAdm: Empty placeholder file for pricing admin editor.
frontend/src/components/admin/SocialLink: Admin form for editing social media URLs with validation and saving to app content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI component showing an access denied message with optional return-to-login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication states and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying business info, location, dynamic social links, and copyright with external attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation links, admin button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderDialo: Dialog that displays an order form and shows a success screen with order ID after submission.
Order submission form with validation, file upload support, and integration with createOrder API.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Static section describing the agency and its mission.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Dynamic contact section loading contact info and displaying details with optional map embed.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with dynamic description, call‑to‑action buttons, and styled background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Displays predefined portfolio items with icons and descriptions in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Pricing: Empty placeholder file for future pricing section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders service cards from serviceCatalog with order buttons and a section header.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Highlights reasons to choose the agency using icon‑based cards.
frontend/src/components/services/service: Exports a list of service definitions with ids, titles, descriptions, and icon components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides deprecated admin authentication logic including login, logout, token verification, and session handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Checks if an admin exists and optionally creates a default admin, exposing state for credentials and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrapStat: Determines backend admin capabilities, checks admin existence, and handles default admin creation with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Tracks admin session state from storage and logs transitions, exposing username and token.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements hooks for creating orders, retrieving orders, downloading files, and deleting orders through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables for themes and global typography plus a gradient animation utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering App into root.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel with tabbed editors for orders, text, social links, and contact settings behind an admin gate.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page composing multiple sections with smooth scrolling and an order dialog.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Extended backend TypeScript interfaces for contact info, orders, and admin-related methods with variant result types.
Diagnostic logger for admin auth events with deduplication and timed reset.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthResult.ts: Normalizes various backend auth response formats into a consistent token/error result.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthVerification: Verifies admin tokens by calling a token-protected backend method and classifying failure reasons.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage with expiry handling, logout reasons, and listener notifications.
frontend/src/utils/adminSetupRecovery.ts: Classifies admin authentication errors into categories like not-setup, invalid credentials, or backend unavailable.
frontend/src/utils/adminTokenError.ts: Detects explicit backend invalid/expired admin token errors via message matching.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File or Blob into a Uint8Array for backend uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and handle persisted parameter logic.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Normalizes various backend and validation errors into safe, user-friendly English messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state and feature requests focused on removing admin-panel authentication and access restrictions.
